name: All The Consoles Mod! (Part 1) 2025 UPDATE!
author: UME
description:
[h1][img]https://i.imgur.com/JNDFKWd.png[/img][/h1]
[i]The OG All The Consoles picture[/i]


[b]100+ Consoles Added to Game Dev Tycoon![/b]

Want more variety in your game? This mod expands your experience by adding 100 consoles (even more with Part 2 of the mod!).

[h2]Requirements, Recommendations & Compatibility:[/h2]

[list]
[*] Requires UltimateLib  
[*] Due to GDT's limitations, this mod is split into two parts. Subscribe to Part 2 to unlock 75 more consoles!  
[*] TAG mod overhauls the whole UI and makes the game look modern! Check it out!  
[*] It's compatible with almost every mod, but I wouldn't recommend adding another mod that also adds more consoles... or using a 10 year old mod for that matter.  
[/list]

[h2]üìú Update Log:[/h2]
(2025-03-15)  
- Remade Units sold (Again) overall increesed the marketshare of most consoles
- Removed DS lite
- Added Dendy 
- Fixed better pictures for some consoles
- Other small fixes

(2025-03-13) 
- Basically remade the whole mod and mod page.
- Resized all images to fit nicely.  
- Fixed unit sales numbers to be accurate with GDT's logic (which makes no sense).  
- Fixed the name of Virtual boy.

(2025-03-12)  
- Updated all console release & discontinuation dates to align with GDT‚Äôs unconventional format.  

üëâ Full update history in the built-in Steam Changelog!

[h2]üõ†Ô∏è How to Install:[/h2]
1Ô∏è‚É£ Subscribe to this mod.  
2Ô∏è‚É£ Subscribe to All The Consoles Mod [Part 2].  
3Ô∏è‚É£ Subscribe to UltimateLib.  
4Ô∏è‚É£ Enable all mods in the mod menu by clicking them (The built in API mod aswell).
5Ô∏è‚É£ Restart the game to activate the mods and enjoy!  

[h2]üìä What It Took To Make This Mod[/h2]
This graph represents the [b]sheer insanity[/b] I went through to make sure every console had [b]accurate release dates and sales numbers so it would make sense with the vanilla consoles[/b].

Did I need to do this? Probably not.  
Did I do it anyway? Absolutely... Now i can sleep Zzzz

[i]First pic: Sales calculations for irl sales to fit in-game sales. Second pic: Calculations how irl dates compare to in-game dates.[/i]
